item.title: Setting Up Autofs for NFS Mounts
item.description: Set up NFS: Follow this guide (for ubuntu): https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-set-up-an-nfs-mount-on-ubuntu-20-04 Autofs is a file system management tool that offers several key features: Dynamic Mounting: File systems are mounted on-demand when they are accessed, reducing the number of mounts that need to be managed manually.
